import React from 'react'; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; const TaskView = ({ tasks, handleEdit, handleDelete,successMessage,errorMessage }) => { return (

Task List

{tasks.map((task, index) => ( ))} {successMessage && {successMessage}} {errorMessage && {errorMessage}}
Title Description Due Date Priority Action
{task.title} {task.desc} {task.due_date} handleEdit(tasks.id)} className="btn btn-primary"> Edit handleDelete(task.id)} className="btn btn-danger"> Delete
); }; export default TaskView;
